casebody.data:
Ashley STEPHENSON
v.
Gary BARTLETT. No. 94PA02-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 11, 2004. Thomas A. Farr, Phillip J. Strach, Cary, Robert N. Hunter, Jr., Greensboro, for Stephenson et al. Roger W. Knight, Raleigh, for Richard Morgan. J. Donald Cowan, Greensboro, for Marc Basnight. Larry D. Hall, Durham, for NC Black Leadership Caucus.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of February 2004 by Appellees' to Amend the Record:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of February 2004."
